lead_paragraph: The Charleroi police said on Twitter that the assailant had been shot and killed, and that the officers’ injuries were not life-threatening.

headline.print_headline: Machete Attack Hurts 2 Officers in Belgian City
headline.main: Machete Attack in Belgium Injures Two Police Officers

snippet: The Charleroi police said on Twitter that the assailant had been shot and killed, and that the officers’ injuries were not life-threatening....
abstract: Unnamed man carrying machete and shouting 'Allahu akbar' injures two police officers in central Belgium, and is subsequently shot to death.
